my favorite band used to be toto.
my friends do not call my by my real name.

participant_2.background:
I used to play with animals, but now I'm too busy with my work.
I would brag about being a good father and making my family happy.
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.
I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi there! How are you today?
Doing well, thanks! I'm just hanging out, listening to music and watching cat videos on YouTube.
Nice! I'm doing pretty good myself. I'm just getting ready to go out and play with my dog.
Oh, that sounds fun! I used to play with animals a lot when I was younger, but I don't have a lot of time for it anymore.
I know what you mean. I used to play with my dog a lot more when I was younger, too. But now that I'm a father, I don't have as much time for it.
Yeah, that's understandable. Being a father is a lot of work!
It is, but it's also very rewarding. I love being a father.
I'm sure you're a great father.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite video game?
My favorite video game is probably The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. It's a classic!
Oh, I love that game! I played it a lot when I was younger.
Me too! It's one of my favorite games of all time.
So, what's your favorite thing to do with your kids?
I love playing games with them, watching movies with them, and just spending time with them in general.
That sounds great. I'm sure your kids love it when you spend time with them.
They do! They love it when I play games with them, especially Mario Kart.
Mario Kart is a classic! I love that game.
Me too! It's one of my favorite games to play with my kids.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a father?
My favorite thing about being a father is seeing my kids grow up and learn new things. It's amazing to watch them learn and develop.
That sounds amazing. I'm sure it's a great feeling.
It is! It's one of the best feelings in the world.
I'm glad to hear that you're happy with being a father.
I am! It's the best thing I've ever done.
That's great to hear.
